comment.brief: Do not apply any standard freezing to the page. It can still be explicitly frozen.
comment.full: Do not apply any standard freezing to the page. It can still be explicitly frozen.

comment.brief: Freezes the page when it's parent navigation is currently navigating.
comment.full: Freezes the page when it's parent navigation is currently navigating.

comment.brief: Specifies when this page will be frozen.
comment.full:
Specifies when this page will be frozen.

For full size transitions, like in a top-level navigator, this value is typically set to `WhileNavigating`:

    <Page Freeze="WhileNavigating">

This may improve navigation performance by essentially blocking animation on the page itself while in transition.

Refer to the @Fuse.Controls.Panel.IsFrozen property.
